text:
Hi all! Interested in a 3-month gig at one of the best small company cultures in North Carolina? <https://lp.enrollmentfuel.com/home|enrollmentFUEL, LLC>, a dynamic start-up, is seeking a HubSpot consultant to help identify gaps in our CRM, suggest best practices, better develop sales module, and train staff to be self-sufficient.
You can expect to provide an average of 10 hours of work per week at a competitive project rate.
If interested, please submit your resume. Our goal is to have the ideal contractor in place by August 15th. To learn more or apply, click <https://enrollmentfuel.breezy.hr/p/6da175353935-HubSpot-guru?source=lp.enrollmentfuel.com/home&popup=true|here>.
Sorry about that! I have my other Slack teams set so that hitting 'enter' starts a new paragraph instead of posting the message immediately! :woman-facepalming:
Oh yes. The quick send all the time lol
